9cc3e4aea9b98d632d42288b71d1fb1cef5d418a:
mutation CreateCourse($name: String!, $displayName: String!, $description: String, $color: String, $startDate: Date!, $endDate: Date!, $groupDeadlineDate: Date, $notificationEmail: String, $isGamificationEnabled: Boolean!) {
  createCourse(name: $name, displayName: $displayName, description: $description, color: $color, startDate: $startDate, endDate: $endDate, groupDeadlineDate: $groupDeadlineDate, notificationEmail: $notificationEmail, isGamificationEnabled: $isGamificationEnabled) {
    id
    name
    displayName
    description
    color
    startDate
    endDate
    groupDeadlineDate
    notificationEmail
    isGamificationEnabled
    __typename
  }
}
93ff8b83c846f412f80e564a899f8a3fbf3cb690:
query GetCockpitSession($id: String!) {
  cockpitSession(id: $id) {
    id
    isLiveQAEnabled
    isConfusionFeedbackEnabled
    isModerationEnabled
    isGamificationEnabled
    namespace
    name
    displayName
    status
    startedAt
    course {
      id
      displayName
      __typename
    }
    blocks {
      id
      order
      status
      expiresAt
      timeLimit
      randomSelection
      execution
      instances {
        id
        questionData {
          id
          name
          type
          content
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    activeBlock {
      id
      __typename
    }
    confusionSummary {
      speed
      difficulty
      numberOfParticipants
      __typename
    }
    feedbacks {
      id
      isPublished
      isPinned
      isResolved
      content
      votes
      createdAt
      resolvedAt
      responses {
        id
        content
        positiveReactions
        negativeReactions
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}
5a845c838b3b5c50e6f1e387aa3f27ae85b1cd44:
query GetCourseOverviewData($courseId: String!) {
  getCourseOverviewData(courseId: $courseId) {
    id
    participant {
      id
      avatar
      username
      xp
      level
      __typename
    }
    participation {
      id
      isActive
      __typename
    }
    course {
      id
      displayName
      color
      description
      isGamificationEnabled
      groupDeadlineDate
      isGroupDeadlinePassed
      awards {
        id
        order
        type
        displayName
        description
        participant {
          id
          username
          avatar
          __typename
        }
        participantGroup {
          id
          name
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      groupActivities {
        id
        displayName
        description
        scheduledStartAt
        scheduledEndAt
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    leaderboard {
      id
      participantId
      username
      avatar
      score
      isSelf
      rank
      __typename
    }
    leaderboardStatistics {
      participantCount
      averageScore
      __typename
    }
    groupLeaderboard {
      id
      name
      score
      __typename
    }
    groupLeaderboardStatistics {
      participantCount
      averageScore
      __typename
    }
    groupActivityInstances {
      id
      decisionsSubmittedAt
      results
      groupActivityId
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
  participantGroups(courseId: $courseId) {
    id
    name
    code
    averageMemberScore
    groupActivityScore
    score
    participants {
      id
      username
      avatar
      score
      isSelf
      level
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}
dcedf4660b759eab45cd5018c25a7485653a7c2a:
query GetParticipantDetails($id: String!) {
  participantDetails(participantId: $id) {
    id
    username
    avatar
    avatarSettings
    level
    levelData {
      id
      avatar
      name
      index
      requiredXp
      nextLevel {
        id
        index
        avatar
        requiredXp
        name
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    xp
    achievements {
      id
      achievedAt
      achievedCount
      achievement {
        id
        name
        description
        icon
        iconColor
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}
c518ff6077ec8146c40f030193aa568be1c3ae87:
query GetPinnedFeedbacks($id: String!) {
  pinnedFeedbacks(id: $id) {
    id
    isLiveQAEnabled
    isConfusionFeedbackEnabled
    isModerationEnabled
    isGamificationEnabled
    confusionSummary {
      speed
      difficulty
      numberOfParticipants
      __typename
    }
    feedbacks {
      id
      isPublished
      isPinned
      isResolved
      content
      votes
      createdAt
      resolvedAt
      responses {
        id
        content
        positiveReactions
        negativeReactions
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}
c16f2b17c41749e44bf29e00af79751350648202:
query GetSingleCourse($courseId: String!) {
  course(id: $courseId) {
    id
    isArchived
    isGamificationEnabled
    pinCode
    name
    displayName
    description
    color
    numOfParticipants
    numOfActiveParticipants
    averageScore
    averageActiveScore
    startDate
    endDate
    sessions {
      id
      name
      displayName
      isGamificationEnabled
      pinCode
      accessMode
      status
      createdAt
      numOfBlocks
      numOfQuestions
      __typename
    }
    learningElements {
      id
      name
      displayName
      status
      stacksWithQuestions
      numOfQuestions
      __typename
    }
    microSessions {
      id
      name
      displayName
      status
      scheduledStartAt
      scheduledEndAt
      numOfInstances
      __typename
    }
    leaderboard {
      id
      score
      rank
      username
      avatar
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}
05603b4fdfd68bbe0990c57cb9e59a5f71ef9705:
query Self {
  self {
    id
    email
    username
    avatar
    avatarSettings
    isActive
    isProfilePublic
    xp
    level
    levelData {
      id
      index
      name
      avatar
      requiredXp
      nextLevel {
        id
        index
        requiredXp
        avatar
        name
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}
